game.name: Sombie
game.genres: 액션, 대규모 멀티플레이어, RPG, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, MMO, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Sombie offers action packed PvP, and PvE in an always online MMO. loot, kill, die, repeat. Explore an endless randomly generated world with your friends. Offering a unique spin on the Zombie survival genre, built from the ground up.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Sombie offers action packed PvP, and PvE in an always online MMO. loot, kill, die, repeat. Explore an endless randomly generated world with your friends. Offering a unique spin on the Zombie survival genre, built from the ground up.
